grounding.title: Find 5 Things.
grounding.subtitle: Use your senses to ground yourself.

step2.desc: Feel the texture of your clothes or desk.

step3.desc: Listen for distant traffic or birds.

step5.desc: Or one emotion you feel right now.

focus.title: Just One Thing.
focus.subtitle: Forget the rest. Can you do just this?
focus.break: Take a break. You've earned it.

message.text1: You don't need to do everything right now.
message.text2: Just focus on this one moment.
message.ready: I'm ready to try one small thing
